title: Bronze Guide on How 2 Get B5
body:
Very simple. Play support every game, but never go bot lane.

Take smite at 3 secs until game starts. 

Steal your junglers first buff or second camp depending on when he smited. 

After this die to enemy mid laner.

Now go top and steal cs all game.

Remember to suck up to your teammates and say, "You guys are great," "Good job," and "Dang man you're incredible."

You have successfully screwed every lane and you should easily lose the game.

P.S. Your team deserves this because riot won't fix the servers. So troll as many people as possibl
